item.title: First
item.description: Hello Hugo aaa bbb ccc hugo server –theme=hyde –buildDrafts hugo –theme=hyde –baseURL=“https://yux829.github.io” $ cd public $ git init $ git remote add origin https://github.com/yux829/blogs.git $ git add -A $ git commit -m “first commit” $ git push -u origin master git remote add origin git@github.com:yux829/yux829.github.io.git https://yux829.github.io https://yux829.github.io
